short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge your user story workflow. Generate Epics and User Stories using your product's unique context.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Product Forge eliminates the grind of writing User Stories

Product Forge writes high-quality Epics, Features, Stories, and Bugs directly in Jira, Azure DevOps, and GitHub. When you combine your business needs and insight with the power of Generative AI it eliminates saves you time, helps your teams understand the work, and reduces the back and forth churn caused by under-refined stories.

➤ Turn Requirements into Stories
In just one click, transform your requirements document into a comprehensive set of user stories, effortlessly detailing every aspect of the work required to deliver an Epic.

➤ Quickly Create Dozens of Stories
Enter a quick list of stories you want to create and Product Forge gives you complete, well-written stories ready to be worked.

➤ Connected To Your Project Management Tools
Import your completed stories directly into Jira, Azure DevOps or GitHub (plus dozens of other platforms).

Benefits

➤ Save Time: Spend less time grinding through stories and more time doing the work you love to do.

➤ Reduce Team Confusion: When every story clearly communicates the entire business need and follows your 
standard, everyone gets it.

➤ Deliver On Time and Under Budget: More thorough work breakdown dramatically increases the accuracy of your estimates.

Works Where You Work
Create Stories Directly From Documents and Spreadsheets:
• Google
• Office365
• PDF files

Integrates seamlessly into your favorite management tools:
• Jira
• Azure DevOps (Azure Boards)
• Asana
• ClickUp
• Plus many more!
 
Information Security
None of your data gets used to train models. We ensure your information remains secure and confidential. For more details, see our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.

Information We Use
Product Forge uses information available from the page you're on when you generate user stories (for example, the "Create Issue" page in Jira or Azure Dev Ops). We also use highlighted text when you generate stories from documents. This information provides some of the context we need to generate amazing stories for you. The rest of it comes from other information you tell us during your initial setup.
